title: Cui Jiahao
author: Cui Jiahao
content: Hi guys,We are developing a new crypto ecosystem with next features and roadmap:- Centralized exchange: Under development, is the first part of our project. It will be opened at 7th June 2022, but you can pre-register and claim for LRN Airdrop and other funny coins faucets.- Blockchain: LirinÃ« testnet will be launched at 7th July 2022, and mainnet at 8th August 2022, with next main features:- Mining algo: RandomX- Blocktime: 30 seconds- Support for smart contracts (tokens, NFT, ...)- Support for Metamask- 16 MB MAX blocksize- Built from scratch using: Python, PHP, NodeJS and MongoDB.- Support for NodeJS pool software.- Decentralized exchange: Based on LRN Smart contracts, will be launched in Q2 2023.- Mining pools: We will create some pools for help new coins.You can create an account and receive LRN daily at: https://lirine.xyz2022 Roadmap: https://lirine.xyz/roadmap.htmlFaucets: https://lirine.xyz/faucets.phpJoin Discord and help to build our community: https://discord.gg/YXART4NCDEBest regards!
